Class TitleFlare

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      TitleFlare

public class TitleFlare
extends greenfoot.Actor

A completely gratuitous lens flare effect. This object will follow a Title object. It will fade in over 60 frames, and pulsate with a period of 160.0 frames.
